parameters.name: search
parameters.description: If set, the endpoint searches for users whom contain this value in either the public name or the email address

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: If set, the endpoint searches for users whom contain this value in either the imported first name

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: If set, the endpoint searches for users whom contain this value in either the imported last name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: If set, the endpoint searches for users whom contain this value in either the imported email

parameters.name: privateDetails
parameters.description: If true and super admin permissions are available, it returns users with private details.

parameters.name: consentSubjects
parameters.description: Write subjects split by comma, if set will return consent statuses for those subjects, otherwise consent statuses will be null
